creator.description:
Labeling services like @moderation.bsky.app usually label contents on a per-post basis. However, for those who never labels their NSFW/sensitive contents, it might be best to mark their whole account as not-suitable.

Upstream: @moderation.bsky.app

locales.description: Users who seldom labels their not-suitable-for-whatever contents.
locales.name: Incorrigible

locales.description: Users who has posted contents flagged by the upstream moderation servichas posted contents flagged by the upstream moderation service.
locales.name: Others
